Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:26:15

Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CMRDUL4_00
From: Internal News <internalnews@onechalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-08-27 14:21
Subject: Prophet Muhammad's (PBUH) Birthday, Organisational Change Announcement | Multibrand
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/0c44798a028d224d4dcdd66c64304922300617373.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1880&user=10620> 	

As part of our Group’s strategic direction to grow and nurture our own brands, we would like to congratulate:

• Fadi Al-Osta as General Manager – The Visitor
• Fadi Thabet as General Manager – Cairo Airport Duty Free (CADF) and
• Reda Keddaji as General Manager – Tryano

reporting to Isabell Hendrichs, Managing Director – Multibrand effective from July 2025.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/ff346af096411deaacbabd86ff7dd37683305955.jpg>

chunks.text:
• Fadi Al-Osta as General Manager – The Visitor
• Fadi Thabet as General Manager – Cairo Airport Duty Free (CADF) and
• Reda Keddaji as General Manager – Tryano

reporting to Isabell Hendrichs, Managing Director – Multibrand effective from July 2025.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/ff346af096411deaacbabd86ff7dd37683305955.jpg> 	

Fadi Al-Osta, GM- The Visitor,  has been with our Group for nearly 30 years, growing alongside the business through a journey of transformation, leading large teams with full P&L ownership, partnering with suppliers to drive results. As a founding member of Faces, he was instrumental in its growth and he looks forward to enhancing The Visitor’s performance and driving its growth.


With 30+ years in beauty and retail, including 20 years at Chalhoub Group, Fadi Thabet, GM - CADF,  has driven revenue growth, operational efficiency, and market expansion for luxury beauty brands. His leadership in large-scale operations has consistently enhanced customer experience. With his appointment to Cairo Airport Duty Free, Fadi will channel his expertise into shaping the future of Duty Free in Egypt.


 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/aa2ddef7dc44c8e38c716b025ac1d5ed986243001.jpg> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/68aebaaa3a44b580000442.jpeg>

chunks.text:
With 30+ years in beauty and retail, including 20 years at Chalhoub Group, Fadi Thabet, GM - CADF,  has driven revenue growth, operational efficiency, and market expansion for luxury beauty brands. His leadership in large-scale operations has consistently enhanced customer experience. With his appointment to Cairo Airport Duty Free, Fadi will channel his expertise into shaping the future of Duty Free in Egypt.


 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/aa2ddef7dc44c8e38c716b025ac1d5ed986243001.jpg> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/68aebaaa3a44b580000442.jpeg> 	

Reda Keddaji's, GM- Tryano, journey with Tryano reflects his passion for retail and his belief in building brands with purpose. He sees Tryano not just as a store, but as a platform that blends global standards with regional identity. Reda’s focus will be on fostering meaningful growth and positioning Tryano at the heart of the community.


Thank you to all three GMs for their exceptional dedication to Chalhoub Group over the years and their ongoing efforts, dedication and passion. Their contributions are instrumental in shaping and growing our business across the region and we wish them the best of luck in their new roles. 

Read More <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1880&user=10620> 

For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1881&user=10620>
